item.title: Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy ProjectSteve SaldivarRuben Salazar didn‚Äôt believe Chicanos would assimilate in America‚Äôs melting pot. ...
item.content:encoded:
Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy ProjectSteve Saldivar

Ruben Salazar didn‚Äôt believe Chicanos would assimilate in America‚Äôs melting pot.

‚ÄúWe were here first. And we‚Äôre just not going to melt.‚Äù
item.author: Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy Project

item.title: Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy Project+6Lorenzo J. RamirezI just attended the dedication and unveiling of a monument created by, Emanuel...
item.content:encoded:
Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy Project+6Lorenzo J. Ramirez

I just attended the dedication and unveiling of a monument created by, Emanuel Martinez, in commemoration of the 1969 West High School Chicana/o student walkouts.

item.title: Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy ProjectCarlos M. Montes is in East Los Angeles, California. ¬∑ InstagramAugust 29th 2021 New generation of...
item.content:encoded:
Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy ProjectCarlos M. Montes is in East Los Angeles, California. ¬∑ Instagram

August 29th 2021 New generation of activists lead our Chicanx Moratorium march and rally to denounce racist LA Sheriff's killings and US wars!
item.author: Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy Project

item.title: Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy Project+6Carlos M. Montes is with Luis Sifuentes and Lupemar Torres. ¬∑ InstagramChicanx Moratorium...
item.content:encoded:
Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy Project+6Carlos M. Montes is with Luis Sifuentes and Lupemar Torres. ¬∑ Instagram

Chicanx Moratorium protest in East LA demanding Chicanx Power August 29th 2021. Denouncing LA Sheriff's killings of our Black and Chicano young men. Denouncing war and racism! Adios Villanueva boot the Banditos Sheriff's gang!

item.title: Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy ProjectCarlos M. Montes ¬∑ InstagramLA County Board of Supervisors passed motion to commemorate 1970...
item.content:encoded:
Denver's Chicano Movement Legacy ProjectCarlos M. Montes ¬∑ Instagram

LA County Board of Supervisors passed motion to commemorate 1970 Chicano Moratorium! August 29th 2021 the new generation of Chicanx activist take us to the streets of ELA and rally at Salazar Park!
